introduction: RH+: El vampiro de Sevilla Full Movie - After 500 years in a German castle in the service of the Count Von Salchichen of Frankfurt, Don Manuel Malasangre and his family also presents the opportunity to return home. Internet purchased a castle in his homeland. But when the problems begin journey undertaken: a series of incidents that certainly lead them to meet other fun creatures and end in the city of New York, far from their original purpose. There are involved in an incredible adventure with aliens, real estate speculators and the American Guild of Vampires. Our friends just as heroes to save the destruction of the Statue of Liberty. You can watch RH+: El vampiro de Sevilla online on TV cable or movie theaters with original audio in Spanish at different dates. Seen in Europa, Europa, this film premiered in theaters in 2007. The DVD and Blu-Ray edition of full movie was sold some time after its official release in theaters.
